name: Emotional Ride
description:
Catch up with an old friend, but try not to get too distracted or stressed.

Distractions add to your stress meter and the more you're stressed, the less you'll be able to focus.

Click LMB to click the pen
Alternate Up Arrow and Down Arrow to complete your breathing exercises.
Hold Shift + Space to cover your ears when the music is too loud

Play with your pen (click), control your breathing (up/down keys) or cover your ears (shift+space) to regain your focus.
